name: Indentured Spirit
languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

action.name: Withering Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage.
